articles.title: Hanover, Mass. woman killed while sunbathing in Florida is identified
articles.description:
Anastasia Fiona Ullman is remembered as an active member of the South Weymouth Church of the Nazarene and the Hanover Council on Aging, her obituary says. 

The post Hanover, Mass. woman killed while sunbathing in Florida is identified appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Anastasia Fiona Ullman, 62, from Hanover, was killed while sunbathing in Florida.
She was an active member of the South Weymouth Church of the Nazarene.
Her death impacts the Hanover Council on Aging and local community members.

articles.title: Here’s what Boston meteorologists are saying about the ‘super active’ weather pattern ahead
articles.description:
"Does the weather app on your phone say snow every day?"

The post Here’s what Boston meteorologists are saying about the ‘super active’ weather pattern ahead appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Meteorologists predict a 'super active' weather pattern affecting Boston through February.
Expect multiple snow events with accumulations potentially exceeding 10 inches this month.
Residents should prepare for disruptions in travel and daily activities due to severe weather.

articles.title: Tiffani Faison opens new restaurant Tigerbaby at High Street Place
articles.description:
The counter-service restaurant serves Asian cuisine and draws inspiration from Tiger Mama, a former Faison restaurant.

The post Tiffani Faison opens new restaurant Tigerbaby at High Street Place appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Tiffani Faison opens Tigerbaby, a new Asian cuisine restaurant, at High Street Place.
Tigerbaby draws inspiration from Faison's previous restaurant, Tiger Mama, enhancing local dining options.
The counter-service format aims to provide quick, accessible meals for Boston residents.

articles.title: 6 maps predicting Wednesday’s snowfall totals
articles.description:
"Rain will develop around midday changing to snow from north to south and roads may get slick after dark."

The post 6 maps predicting Wednesday’s snowfall totals appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Rain will transition to snow in Boston on Wednesday, February 18, 2026.
Snowfall predictions indicate slick roads after dark, impacting evening commutes.
Residents should prepare for hazardous driving conditions due to expected snowfall totals.

articles.title: The Rev. Jesse Jackson, who led the Civil Rights Movement for decades after King, has died at 84
articles.description:
Jackson led a lifetime of crusades in the U.S and abroad, advocating for the poor and underrepresented on issues from voting rights and job opportunities to education and health care.

The post The Rev. Jesse Jackson, who led the Civil Rights Movement for decades after King, has died at 84 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Rev. Jesse Jackson, a Civil Rights leader, died at 84 on February 17, 2026.
Jackson advocated for voting rights and job opportunities for marginalized communities.
His passing may impact ongoing civil rights initiatives in Boston and beyond.
